title: Gamify DEX - initial fork
body:
What fork are we going to base the DEX on? 

Note: This has no effect on theming and Gamify specific features ( in-game currency integrations and removal of some of the more currently problematic features such as flash loans ) and just affects the initial layout and default usability. 

Regardless of the above, we will also look at differences between Uniswap v3 and current Pancakeswap. 

More information will be available in community discussions on TG.
author: 0x30f5EBB6357521A67c1227826c04CA8Adb1f5c88
